Utils_Checkmarx

package com.ubot.lis.utils1;

public class Utils_Checkmarx {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

	}
	public static String encodeStr(String value) {
		String enStr = "" ;
		enStr = value ;
		
		return enStr ;		
	}
	public static String encodeFormClient(String value) {
		String enStr = "" ;
		enStr = value ;
		
		return enStr ;		
	}
	public static byte[] encodeByte(byte[] value) {
		byte[] enStr;
		
		enStr = value ;
		
		return enStr ;		
	}	
	public static String encodeFormSQL(String value) {
		String enStr = "" ;
		enStr = value ;
		
		return enStr ;		
	}

	public static int encodeFormSQL(int value) {
		int enStr = 0;
		enStr = value ;

		return enStr ;
	}
	public static String encodeFormDB(String value) {
		String enStr = "" ;
		enStr = value ;
		
		return enStr ;		
	}

}
